client_description_Summary_Note:
Bauer Schmitz Herrmann and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Berlin. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
Bauer Schmitz Herrmann is a 24 year old and comes from Germany.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
client_description_Family_Background: Bauer Schmitz Herrmann is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Bauer completed his secondary education at Maria-Theresia-Gymnasium München in 2018.
Bauer received his degree from Jacobs University Bremen in 2025.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Bauer Schmitz Herrmann is a 24 year old and comes from Germany.
Bauer Schmitz Herrmann did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1560000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2016, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
